name: The Coat (Bored Clerk Games)
description:
The Coat is inspired by the short story written by A.E.D. Smith. 

A traveler takes shelter in the wrong remote French chateau.  Explore the house, read the story of it's inhabitants. 

Highlight keys and press left mouse button to pickup. Press E to open doors. Click on the pad surrounding the diaries to read entries.  Press q to quit the game at any time.
